author: ETA PRIME
description:
The new Redmagic ASTRA gaming tablet has arrived, and it appears to be the ultimate 9-inch OLED tablet for emulation and gaming! It’s powered by the Snapdragon 8 elite processor and backed by an incredibly large LPDD5T RAM, ensuring lightning-fast performance. The tablet boasts a stunning 165Hz refresh rate, a 9.06-inch OLED screen with a resolution of 2,400 x 1,504 pixels, and a peak brightness of 1,600 nits. Redmagic has also equipped the tablet with an 8,200mAh battery, which they’ve managed to supercharge!
